newsitem.title: CANADA: Cinram to issue 2.5 million warrants.
newsitem.headline: Cinram to issue 2.5 million warrants.

text.p: Cinram Ltd said on Tuesday it agreed to issue 2.5 million special warrants at C$31.50 per special warrant.

Each warrant entitles the holder to acquire one common share for no additional consideration. If the company fails to obtain a receipt for a final prospectus qualifying the issue of the common shares on exercise of the warrants by the end of the business day on March 7, 1997, each warrant will be exchangeable into 1.1 common shares.
Cinram said it would use proceeds to expand its business activities.
